author: Siamak Masnavi, CD Analytics
title: Bitcoin Falls Below $104K as Retail Investor Sentiment Returns to Liberation Day Levels
description: Bitcoin dipped below $104,000 following a 4% drop, even as analysts say extreme bearish sentiment from retail may hint at a rebound.
content:
Bitcoin (BTC)
